author: sidney
title: Detroit + Wada Diaspora Hub
description: Detroit is a great American city that has decayed.  Crime, low wages, healthcare shortfalls , and poor education been devastating.
solution: Blockchain and emerging tech offer new opportunities for Detroiters. A Wada Hub will bring exposure to the DLT and the Cardano ecosystem.
